commit message:
Fix https://github.com/n76/Local-GSM-Backend/issues/58

Also consider it a fix for https://github.com/n76/Local-GSM-Backend/issues/60

Add advanced setting to allow user to set directory used for database
operations. If not set to a valid read/writeable directory then the
standard Android app files area is use.

Signed-off-by: Tod Fitch <Tod@FitchDesign.com>
